    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM       http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>LearningSpace</catalog>
            <entry>A103_6</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-gb">History as commemoration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte als Gedenken</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire comme commémoration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History como o commemoration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia come commemoration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία ως εορτασμό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia como conmemoración</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-gb</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-gb">Commemoration – remembering and marking your past – makes an important contribution to our sense of community. Written texts, memorials, letters and photographs can all serve to commemorate events, people and values we wish to remember from our past.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts and History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Commemoration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Community</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Memorials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Photographs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Study_skills</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-gb">Texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>linear</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>2</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gedenken? an Ihre Vergangenheit sich 
erinnern und kennzeichnend? bildet einen wichtigen Beitrag zu 
unserer Richtung der Gemeinschaft. Schriftliche Texte, 
Denkmäler, Briefe und Fotographien können aller Serve, Fälle, Leute
und an Werte gedenken, die wir uns von unserer Vergangenheit erinnern 
möchten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Commémoration ? se rappelant et marquant 
votre passé ? apporte une contribution importante à notre sens
de la communauté. Les textes, les mémoriaux, les lettres et 
les photographies écrits peuvent tout servir à commémorer des 
événements, des personnes et des valeurs que nous souhaitons nous 
rappeler de notre passé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Commemoration? recordando e marcando seu 
passado? faz uma contribuição importante a nosso sentido da 
comunidade. Os textos, os memorials, as letras e as fotografias 
escritos podem todo o saque comemorar eventos, povos e valores que 
nós desejamos recordar de nosso passado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Commemoration? ricordandosi e 
contrassegnando della vostra esperienza? dà un contributo 
importante al nostro senso di Comunità. I testi, i memoriali, 
le lettere e le fotografie scritti possono tutto il serv commemorare 
gli eventi, la gente ed i valori che desideriamo ricordarsi di dalla 
nostra esperienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εορτασμός; ανάμνηση και χαρακτηρισμός του 
παρελθόντος σας; έχει μια σημαντική συμβολή στην αίσθηση 
κοινότητάς μας. Τα γραπτές κείμενα, τα μνημεία, οι 
επιστολές και οι φωτογραφίες μπορούν όλα να χρησιμεύσουν να 
τιμήσουν την μνήμη των γεγονότων, των ανθρώπων και των τιμών που 
επιθυμούμε να θυμηθούμε από το παρελθόν μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Conmemoración? ¿recordando y marcando su 
pasado? hace una contribución importante a nuestro sentido de 
la comunidad. Los textos, los monumentos, las letras y las 
fotografías escritos pueden todo el servicio conmemorar 
acontecimientos, la gente y valores que deseamos recordar a partir de 
nuestro pasado.</string>
          </description>
